declarations.description: A better time-element, e.g. live changing relative dates
declarations.name: u2-time

attributes.name: datetime
attributes.description: The date and time to display, in ISO 8601 format

attributes.name: lang
attributes.description: The language to use for formatting the date and time

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of display to use, either 'date' or 'relative'

attributes.name: weekday
attributes.description: The format to use for the weekday, either 'narrow', 'short', 'long', or 'none'

attributes.name: year
attributes.description: The format to use for the year, either 'numeric', '2-digit', or 'none'

attributes.name: month
attributes.description: The format to use for the month, either 'numeric', '2-digit', 'narrow', 'short', 'long', or 'none'

attributes.name: day
attributes.description: The format to use for the day, either 'numeric', '2-digit', or 'none'

attributes.name: hour
attributes.description: The format to use for the hour, either 'numeric', '2-digit', or 'none'

attributes.name: minute
attributes.description: The format to use for the minute, either 'numeric', '2-digit', or 'none'

attributes.name: second
attributes.description: The format to use for the second, either 'numeric', '2-digit', or 'none'

attributes.name: mode
attributes.description: The mode to use for the relative type, either 'narrow', 'short', or 'long'
